subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] LOL Frank
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1895862401-1184565921=:19076
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I think he must have meant he was going. He unjoined?  And yes I remember quite a few of your "arguements" and the outcomes. You dont need reminding nor do I. Hehehe
   
  Fights and namecalling are far different topics than debate or discussion. I would hope everyone is here for the latter. This isnt Evp-Fight-Club and the discussions have been quite beneficial and making some progress. You know better than anyone how distracting and unhealthy it can be as well as interfere with the work going on. 
   
  I think the guys have decided to be adults and let it rest so nobodys been banned. If not they can take it into private discussion between themselves and leave the rest of us out of it.
   
  We all do much better working together for the goal we all have in common. We are all students learning and hoping to improve. It's not a contest.
   
  Misty 
   
   
  
Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
  What!!? What'dya mean somebody's gotta go? Over some comment? Does anyone 
remember how many arguements I've started, or gotten in over the years? I 
think y'all need to back the tape up and chill.

Frank-S


>From: "Keith Clark" 
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: 
>Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] responce to comment by steve h.
>Date: Sun, 15 Jul 2007 12:03:00 -0700
>
>O.K. I�m with Misty. Somebody�s gotta go.
>
>
>
>
>
>Keith
>
>
>
>From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
>bhali333
>Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2007 8:08 AM
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] responce to comment by steve h.
>
>
>
>Steve,
>I know that your post about "begging for a box" was directed at me.
>Frankly I am insulted, I thought we had developed a somewhat off the
>group friendship. Your response to my post to frank for a box was not
>begging but I believe that your obvious attempt at ass kissing is
>more insulting to frank than my asking for a box. it seems to me that
>you are afraid that I may get a box before you do and that for some
>reason you deserve one more than anyone else. I don't understand that
>being you already ripped off franks design and had some one build you
>a number of boxes on your own. As far as serious evp research goes I
>have dedicated many many hours, much more than you have I'm sure to
>evp research and other forms of itc. matter of fact if anyone takes a
>look at your site the couple of dust orb pictures you have and the
>only evps I have heard are recent ones gleaned from the boxes you had
>made do not make you a dedicated seasoned pro at PI. I also remember
>not long ago you contacting me for advice and asking to join my team
>so in some way you must have recognised my professionalism. I will
>end by saying, If you want a box from frank be honest and ask like I
>did instead of trying to cuddle up next to him with your own version
>of his box and make it like you care about his feelings or protecting
>him from any annoyances. who made you the frank police anyway. steve
>just be real lets all work together and help each other do not try to
>sabotage anyone else hoping to further your own ambitions, you work
>with auto parts all day while I am doing evp research so you tell me
>who is more qualified to work with the box me or you?
>
>I hope I didn't piss anybody off this is just my opinion!
>
>bruce
>
>
>
